eval_title: Our Students  Department of Chemistry - University of Illinois Springfield - UIS

rule_results.rule_summary: OBJECT for audio must have alternative
EMBED for audio must have alternative

rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that there is no media content that plays automatically and includes audio content that lasts longer than 3 seconds.  If the audio content lasts longer than 3 seconds, verify the user can pause, stop or mute the audio.
MC: 97 elements require manual checking for CCR thrshold to the use of background images.; H: The 140 elements with text content that are hidden were not analyzed for color contrast accessibility.
MC: Verify color is not used as the only visual means of conveying information, indicating an action, prompting a response, or distinguishing a visual element on the page.
None; H: One form control element that is hidden was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: Image button must have alt. content
Radio buttons must have grouping label

rule_results.result_message: None; H: The BUTTON that is hidden was not evaluated.
None; H: The LABEL element that is hidden was not evaluated.
None; H: One LABEL or LEGEND element that is hidden was not evaluated.
N/A; H: The form control element that is hidden was not evaluated.
N/A; H: The form control or ARIA widget element that is hidden was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: SUBMIT and RESET buttons must be unique

rule_results.result_message: MC: If the form control can be validated make sure it indicates invalid values when invalid.; H: The control element that is hidden does not need to be tested for indicating invalid values.

MC: If the form control is required, add the REQUIRED attribute or if HTML4 compatibility is required the ARIA-REQUIRED="TRUE" attribute.; H: The form control element that is hidden does not need to be tested for being required.

MC: If the form control element or widget can automatically detect errors and suggest corrections, make sure that at least one accessible technique is used to present the suggestion to the user.; H: The form control element and/or widget that is hidden does not need to be tested for accessible suggestions.

MC: If the 3 form controls and widgets on this page are used for legal and/or financial transactions, make sure the actions are either reversible or requires the user to confirm the information before the transaction is finalized.; H: The 2 form control elements and/or widgets that are hidden does not need to be tested for accessible suggestions.

MC: Check the "tab" focus order of the page to make sure the sequence of focusable elements is meaningful.; H: The 130 links, form controls, embedded apps and/or widgets that are hidden do not need to be tested for focus order.

MC: Use the "tab" key to move focus between links, form controls, embedded apps and widgets and check the visibility of focus styling for each element as it receives focus.; H: The 137 links, form controls, embedded apps and/or widgets that are hidden do not need to be tested for focus order.

rule_results.rule_summary: Target focus must be in content window
rule_results.result_message: MC: Check the 52 links to make sure that if any of the links opens more than one window that the focus is in the content window.; H: The 128 link elements that are hidden do not need to be tested for content focus.
MC: Verify that each of the 2 forms has a button used to submit the form.
None; H: One H1 element that is hidden was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: H1 should be in MAIN or BANNER landmark
rule_results.result_message: None; H: One H1 element that is hidden was not evaluated.
None; H: 3 heading elements that are hidden were not evaluated.
None; H: 3 heading elements that are hidden were not evaluated.
MC: Verify that the text alternative for each of the 14 IMG elements and/or elements with [ROLE="IMG"] accurately and succinctly summarizes the content and/or purpose of the image.

rule_results.rule_summary: Alt text must not include filename
Alt text no more than 100 characters

rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify the image is being used purely for decorative, spacing or styling purposes.
MC: Determine if any of the 14 IMG elements and/or elements with [ROLE="IMG"] can benefit from a long description, and for each that can, provide a detailed description of the content of the image.
MC: If the 14 IMG elements and/or elements with [ROLE="IMG"] represents a mathematical expression, convert the image content to MathML.

rule_results.rule_summary: Interactive functionality must be keyboard operable
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that the functionality provided by the 11 links, form controls, elements with event handlers and/or embedded applications is operable through the keyboard.; H: 131 hidden links, form controls, elements with event handlers, OBJECT and/or APPLET elements were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: BANNER landmark: no more than one
rule_results.result_message: None; H: One BANNER landmark that is hidden was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: CONTENTINFO landmark: no more than one

rule_results.result_message: None; H: One element with [ROLE="HIDDEN"] attribute or HEADER element that is hidden was not evaluated.
None; H: One element with [ROLE="BANNER"] or top-level HEADER element that is hidden was not evaluated.
None; H: One NAVIGATION landmark that is hidden was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: REGION landmark must have accessible name
rule_results.result_message: MC: Determine if any of the 4 elements with ARIA role of REGION should be landmarks, and if so, add an accessible name to the those elements.; H: One element with ARIA role of REGION that is hidden was not evaluated.
None; H: 2 landmarks that are hidden were not evaluated.
MC: Verify that each of the 11 landmark roles correctly identifies the content region for which its corresponding element is a container.; H: 2 landmarks that are hidden were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: COMPLEMENTARY landmark: must be top level

rule_results.result_message: MC: Review the page for any text content that is different than the principal language of the page. If such content is found, use the LANG attribute on the appropriate container element to identify the language change.

rule_results.rule_summary: Layout tables must have meaningful sequence
Link text must describe the link target
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify the accessible name of each of the 52 A, AREA or [ROLE=LINK] elements describes the target of the link.; H: 128 hidden links were not evaluated.
W: Change the accessible names or add ARIA-DESCRIBEDBY attributes to the 2 A, AREA or [ROLE=LINK] elements to provide additional information that makes each accessible name or description unique.
MC: Verify the 53 list elements are used semantically.; H: The 137 hidden list elements were not evaluated.
MC: Determine whether the 10 list container elements benefit from labels and, if so, verify that each accurately describes the contents of the list.; H: The 2 hidden list elements were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: At least two ways of finding content
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that this page can be found from other pages in the website using at least two of the following features: a website search feature; a list of links for navigation from at least one other page in the website and/or from a page in the web site that serves as a site map.
MC: Verify that this page uses the same ordering of MAIN, NAVIGATION, SEARCH, BANNER, CONTENTINFO, COMPLEMENTARY and any other shared landmarks as other pages within the website.

rule_results.rule_summary: Consistent ordering of H1 and H2 labels
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that this page uses the same ordering of H1 and H2 elements used to mark recurring page sections as the ordering used on the other pages within the website.

MC: Verify that the labeling of the MAIN, NAVIGATION, SEARCH, BANNER, COMPLEMENTARY and CONTENTINFO landmarks on this page is consistent with the labeling of all comparable landmarks on all other pages within the website.

rule_results.rule_summary: Consistent H1 and H2 page section labels
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that the accessible names of H1 and H2 elements used to identify recurring page sections are consistent with those on all other pages within the website.
MC: Verify the 40 elements positioned with CSS maintain a reading order meaningful to users of assistive technologies.; H: 28 elements positioned with CSS that are hidden were not evaluated.
MC: Resize the text using the zoom feature of the browser to check to make sure text content is visible (e.g. text is not clipped by iframe sizes or CSS overflow limits).

rule_results.rule_summary: OL and UL role grouping semantics
Do not override NAV element semantics.
Do not override HEADER element ROLE.
Do not override FOOTER element ROLE.
Not only shape, size and location
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that understanding the content, navigation of links and operation of controls and widgets does not depend solely on the shape, size, visual location, orientation, or sound.

rule_results.rule_summary: Data cells must have row/column headers
Data tables must have unique names
Identify table markup as data or layout
Header cells should be TH elements
Data cells must use HEADERS attribute
TITLE must identify website and page
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that the TITLE element identifies both the website (if applicable) and the page content.
MC: If the page contains time limits, verify that there is a way to turn off, adjust or extend the time limits; or that one of the three exceptions applies.

rule_results.rule_summary: Control moving, blinking or auto-updating content
rule_results.result_message: MC: If the page includes moving, blinking, scrolling or auto-updating content, verify there has a mechanism to pause, stop, or hide the information.
MC: Verify the page does not include content that flashes more than three times in one second, unless below general flash and red flash thresholds.

rule_results.rule_summary: VIDEO for video only must have alternative
OBJECT for video only must have alternative
EMBED for video only must have alternative
OBJECT for video must have captions
EMBED for video must have captions
VIDEO element must have audio description.
OBJECT for video must have audio description.
EMBED for video must have audio description

rule_results.result_message: None; H: The widget that is hidden and was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: Elements with event handlers must have roles
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify the user interactions associated with the 8 interactive elements with one or more event handlers are accurately described by each element's widget role and/or their descendants.; H: The 104 interactive elements with event handlers were not evaluated.
